de:
L√©a Salam√© und Philippe Vandel werden zu den G√§sten des 7. Journalismusfestivals geh√∂ren.

- MUSS MAN ANGST VOR K√úNSTLICHER INTELLIGENZ HABEN?

en:
L√©a Salam√© and Philippe Vandel will be among the guests of the 7th Festival of Journalism.
Here are the seven themes that will animate the debates of this new edition:
- SHOULD WE BE AFRAID OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE?
- IS IT POSSIBLE TO INFORM WITHOUT GETTING DEPRESSED?
- HAS RUGBY LOST ITS SOUL?
- CAN DEMOCRACY DISAPPEAR?
- MENTAL HEALTH, THE TIME BOMB
- IRAN, A WIND OF FREEDOM
- WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF PUBLIC BROADCASTING?
?? On the program: 3 days of debates, meetings, testimonies, workshops, exhibitions, gastronomy, swimming, concerts ...
- Ticketing at the Tourist Office of Marmande, 11 rue Toupinerie. Monday from 2 to 6 pm and Tuesday to Saturday from 9:30 am to 12:30 pm - 2 to 6 pm.
+ 33 (0)5 53 64 44 44
